document_data.mainbody:
oy was an aasimar dancer in Neverwinter in the 1370s DR.
She was a dancer who took pride in bringing happiness and light to the people.
Joy was brought up by priests of Lathander, together with her twin sister, Light of Heavens.
In 1374 DR, she was in the Merchants District in Neverwinter. Joy may have been recruited by the Kalach-Cha to go to Crossroad Keep to work for Sal, the tavern-keeper at the Keep.
